events.title: Kickoff & Retrospective
actionItems: Project sign-up form opens immediately after the session.
whatHappens: Showcase highlights from last semester (projects and activities).
Present new project options for this semester.
events.goal: Get everyone excited and aware of the options.

events.title: Deadline & Team Formation
actionItems: Project sign-ups close exactly 7 days after Week 1.
Finalize team rosters and confirm roles.
whatHappens: Guest speaker shares insights on team collaboration.
Review sign-ups and align on project expectations.
events.goal: Form teams and lock in project commitments.

events.title: Milestone 1
whatHappens: Teams present their plan and outline initial scope.
Feedback round with mentors and peers.
events.goal: Align on scope, roles, and execution plan.

events.title: Buffer Week
actionItems: Continue project work and reach out for support as needed.
events.goal: Keep teams moving forward while removing blockers.

events.title: Milestone 2
whatHappens: Teams demo current progress and share blockers.

events.title: Breaking Into Data Science: Internship & Job Insights
whatHappens: Discussion on internships, full‑time roles, impactful projects, and real‑world expectations.
events.goal: Understand what hiring managers look for in data science candidates.

events.title: Milestone 3
deliverables: List remaining tasks before Demo Day
whatHappens: Teams present near-final demo and remaining tasks.

events.title: Final Sprint
actionItems: Finalize slides and polish the final demo.
whatHappens: Teams focus on polish, QA, and presentation readiness.
events.goal: Get demos and presentations fully polished.

events.title: Demo Day
events.goal: Showcase outcomes and celebrate the semester.
